nodes.text: The Jedi Temple Guard were some of the best fighters the Jedi Order had to offer, sworn to protect the various Jedi temples to the end. The armor they wore was as imposing as it was effective. Temple guard armor composed of brown-armored robes, a helmet, and an impassive, emotionless mask. The armored mask contained a comlink and a scanner located in the helmet. After Order 66, some of their battlegear survived in private collections and the lost corners of the galaxy.
